mapper.select: SELECT tb_deliverylog.dlid, tb_user.NAME, tb_property.pname, tb_deliverylog.spec, tb_deliverylog.number, tb_deliverylog.type2, tb_deliverylog.type, tb_deliverylog.deliveryDate, tb_deliverylog.imgSrc, tb_deliverylog.remark FROM tb_deliverylog LEFT JOIN tb_user ON tb_deliverylog.NAME = tb_user.uid LEFT JOIN tb_property ON tb_deliverylog.pname = tb_property.pid ${ew.customSqlSegment}
